verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> that came to Micah <S%H4318><s%> the Morashtite <S%H4183><s%> in the days <S%H3117><s%> of Jotham, <S%H3147><s%> Ahaz, <S%H271><s%> and Hezekiah, <S%H3169><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> which he saw <S%H2372><s%> concerning Samaria <S%H8111><s%> and Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

Hear, <S%H8085><s%> you peoples, <S%H5971><s%> all of you. <S%H7181><s%> Listen, O earth, <S%H776><s%> and all that is therein: <S%H4393><s%> and let the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh <S%H3069><s%> be witness <S%H5707><s%> against you, <S%H136><s%> the Lord from his holy <S%H6944><s%> temple. <S%H1964><s%>

For, <S%H3068><s%> behold, Yahweh comes forth <S%H3318><s%> out of his place, <S%H4725><s%> and will come down <S%H3381><s%> and tread <S%H1869><s%> on the high places <S%H1116><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>

The mountains <S%H2022><s%> melt <S%H4549><s%> under him, <S%H6010><s%> and the valleys split <S%H1234><s%> apart, <S%H1749><s%> like wax before <S%H6440><s%> the fire, <S%H784><s%> like waters <S%H4325><s%> that are poured <S%H5064><s%> down a steep place. <S%H4174><s%>

"All this is for the disobedience <S%H6588><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> and for the sins <S%H2403><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%> What is the disobedience <S%H6588><s%> of Jacob? <S%H3290><s%> Isn't <S%H8111><s%> it Samaria? And what are the high places <S%H1116><s%> of Judah? <S%H3063><s%> Aren't <S%H3389><s%> they Jerusalem?

Therefore I will make <S%H7760><s%> Samaria <S%H8111><s%> like a rubble heap <S%H5856><s%> of the field, <S%H7704><s%> like places for planting vineyards; <S%H3754><s%> and I will pour down <S%H5064><s%> its stones <S%H68><s%> into the valley, <S%H1516><s%> and I will uncover <S%H1540><s%> its foundations. <S%H3247><s%>

All her idols <S%H6456><s%> will be beaten to pieces, <S%H3807><s%> and all her temple gifts <S%H868><s%> will be burned <S%H8313><s%> with fire, <S%H784><s%> and all her images <S%H6091><s%> I will <S%H7760><s%> destroy; <S%H8077><s%> for of the hire <S%H868><s%> of a prostitute <S%H2181><s%> has she gathered <S%H6908><s%> them, <S%H868><s%> and to the hire of a prostitute <S%H2181><s%> shall they return. <S%H7725><s%>"

For this I will lament <S%H5594><s%> and wail; <S%H3213><s%> I will go <S%H3212><s%> stripped <S%H7758><s%> and naked; <S%H6174><s%> I will <S%H6213><s%> howl <S%H4553><s%> like the jackals, <S%H8577><s%> and moan <S%H60><s%> like the daughters of owls. <S%H1323><s%>

For her wounds <S%H4347><s%> are incurable; <S%H605><s%> for it has come <S%H935><s%> even to Judah. <S%H3063><s%> It reaches <S%H5060><s%> to the gate <S%H8179><s%> of my people, <S%H5971><s%> even to Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>
Don't <S%H5046><s%> tell it in Gath. <S%H1661><s%> Don't <S%H1058><s%> weep at all. <S%H1058><s%> At Beth Ophrah <S%H1036><s%> I have rolled <S%H6428><s%> myself in the dust. <S%H6083><s%>

Pass on, <S%H5674><s%> inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> of Shaphir, <S%H8208><s%> in nakedness <S%H6181><s%> and shame. <S%H1322><s%> The inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> of Zaanan <S%H6630><s%> won't <S%H3318><s%> come out. The wailing <S%H4553><s%> of Beth Ezel <S%H1018><s%> will take <S%H3947><s%> from you his protection. <S%H5979><s%>

For the inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> of Maroth <S%H4796><s%> waits anxiously <S%H2342><s%> for good, <S%H2896><s%> because evil <S%H7451><s%> has come down <S%H3381><s%> from Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> to the gate <S%H8179><s%> of Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

Harness <S%H7573><s%> the chariot <S%H4818><s%> to the swift steed, <S%H7409><s%> inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> of Lachish. <S%H3923><s%> She was the beginning <S%H7225><s%> of sin <S%H2403><s%> to the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion; <S%H6726><s%> For the transgressions <S%H6588><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were found in you. <S%H4672><s%>

Therefore you will give <S%H5414><s%> a parting gift <S%H7964><s%> to Moresheth Gath. <S%H4182><s%> The houses <S%H1004><s%> of Achzib <S%H392><s%> will be a deceitful thing <S%H391><s%> to the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

I will yet bring <S%H935><s%> to you, <S%H3427><s%> inhabitant of Mareshah. <S%H4762><s%> He <S%H3423><s%> who is the glory <S%H3519><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> will come <S%H935><s%> to Adullam. <S%H5725><s%>

Shave <S%H7139><s%> your heads, <S%H1494><s%> and cut off your hair for the children <S%H1121><s%> of your delight. <S%H8588><s%> Enlarge <S%H7337><s%> your baldness <S%H7144><s%> like the vulture; <S%H5404><s%> for they have gone into captivity from you! <S%H1540><s%>
